title: BillTogether
shortDescription: A bill splitting app that helps groups manage expenses

features.title: Easy Bill Creation
features.description: Create and manage bills effortlessly for your groups or personal expenses

features.title: Flexible Group Management
features.description: Create groups, add members, and organize your shared expenses seamlessly

features.title: Customizable Splitting Options
features.description: Split bills equally, by percentage, or with custom amounts to suit any situation

features.title: Clear Financial Overview
features.description: View a comprehensive dashboard of what you owe and what others owe you

features.title: Secure Settlement Process
features.description: Ensure all debts are properly settled with a user acknowledgment system

features.title: Bill Protection
features.description: Prevent accidental deletions with a lock on unsettled bills
